text: Condé-sur-Noireau is a former commune. It is found in the Normandy region in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of Condé-en-Normandie.Arrêté préfectoral 1 December 2015 == References == Category:Former communes in Calvados
title: Condé-sur-Noireau
